    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from pandas._libs.tslibs.parsing import get_rule_month
    4: 
    5: from pandas.tseries import offsets
    6: 
    7: 
    8: @pytest.mark.parametrize(
    9:     "obj,expected",
   10:     [
   11:         ("W", "DEC"),
   12:         (offsets.Week().freqstr, "DEC"),
   13:         ("D", "DEC"),
   14:         (offsets.Day().freqstr, "DEC"),
   15:         ("Q", "DEC"),
   16:         (offsets.QuarterEnd(startingMonth=12).freqstr, "DEC"),
   17:         ("Q-JAN", "JAN"),
   18:         (offsets.QuarterEnd(startingMonth=1).freqstr, "JAN"),
   19:         ("Y-DEC", "DEC"),
   20:         (offsets.YearEnd().freqstr, "DEC"),
   21:         ("Y-MAY", "MAY"),
   22:         (offsets.YearEnd(month=5).freqstr, "MAY"),
   23:     ],
   24: )
   25: def test_get_rule_month(obj, expected):
   26:     result = get_rule_month(obj)
   27:     assert result == expected
